website_summaries.verdict: A high-speed gaming computer with extras that are more than worth the price.
pros: Includes 16GB RAM, 1TB hard drive, and 3.2 GHz AMD processor
Graphics card keeps up with just about every game
cons: The USB ports on the back of the computer can be hit-or-miss

customer_reviews.title: Blue Screen Issues Resolved by Skytech Support
customer_reviews.text: Poor performance Out of the box. This thing has yet to run longer than 10 minutes. I've only had this running for about an hour and already had 7 blue screens. (I'm writing this review from my work computer). At this point I just want to send it back. Edited. The Skytech suppot folks had me remove a stick of ram and it ran all night without issues. I reinstalled the ram this morning and it's running great. Now I have the PC I was expecting. Awesome job guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: to me it looks amazing inside and out it has a clear through panel ...
customer_reviews.text: So i have had this computer for about 2 weeks now and all i can say about it is positive things. First lets start with how it looks, to me it looks amazing inside and out it has a clear through panel so you could see the beauty inside. So far every game i throw at it can run it perfect on ultra-high settings including Fortnite Destiny 2 The Division Fallout 4 and many more. it has not given me any problems what so ever. I do believe this is the best prebuilt gaming pc in the market right now. I really recommend this pc to anyone who is looking into getting into pc gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a mid-size tower with lots of flash. The price is good. There's 16GB ram, and a decent video card. Caveats: No optical drive (CD/DVD). No license key sticker on computer. Use freeware program Keyfinder to extract the license number if you want to swap out the hdd for ssd or larger hdd. Failing that, use a disk cloning program like Clonezilla to clone the drive. Limited expandability. Use your SATA connections wisely. There are only 4. Operation seems smooth enough, and it's pretty. I'll update as I continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trekgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Good pre built gaming pc.
customer_reviews.text: great pre built pc, especially now that gpu prices are going up quite a bit. My only issue is that 2 of the backside usb ports are wonky and if the devices plugged into them are nudged they disconnect, not a gigantic issue and it could be a problem with just my pc, not all. Also the mouse and keyboard that come with the pc aren't trash like i was kind of expecting them to be so that's nice. Overall if buying parts separately is too expensive or seems to daunting to do buy yourself this is a nice buy. I've recommended this to friends of mine looking for pcs and i recommend it to you too.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hammelbacher

customer_reviews.title: Impressed...Outstanding.....Well Worth the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait for it to arrive & when it did I was very impressed with the look & it took nothing so set-up, once the updates were done, oh forgot to mention I also upgraded the Wifi card with (BT), the download speed is fantastic & boots very quickly, I have paired it with my Onkyo Receiver, I am very impressed!!!, it was well worth the money spent! I am very satisfied & would recommend this PC to a friend!! OUTSTANDING PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Crashse every few minutes.  Terrible for gaming unless you like to DC 3 times in a 20 minute game
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and very fast. Great for Gaming. Comes with a black keyboard and mouse, but purchased a white and blue keyboard and mouse to match the computer. Just plug in the monitor, keyboard, and mouse and you are good to go. P.S. Remember to remove the protective foam inside of the desktop computer casing. ***** UPDATE The computer keeps crashing and giving me the blue error screen. Don't buy this PC, or anything else from Skytech. I tried contacting them to ask for a reboot disc (one wasn't included when I purchased the computer), but I found out that they changed accounts with Amazon and no longer receive emails on complaints on this PC. How convenient for them.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Holden

customer_reviews.title: But this instead of trying to build your own
customer_reviews.text: A solid, well built machine. Cable management is great and very clean. Extra big fans make this rig run fast but quiet. Appreciate that they are quality fans that aren’t loud. My favorite part is that this is stock Windows with necessary drivers only, no extra bloatware to slow it down.
customer_reviews.author: tfreyaus

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast Computer I am completely in love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for home because the computers I have purchased in the past have been named brand, and they always failed, in all sorts of ways, I really researched this computer and for the amount of money you spend it is the fastest computer you will find out there. After having it for a month I am still in love with this computer, after looking into the computer it has 8 fans, think about that alone, it can run all day without any issues. Don't think about this purchase it is a great investment. Looking back I don't regret buying this at all, I use it for gaming and other production products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pissed
customer_reviews.text: This computer is starting to piss me off. I was hoping since the reviews were so good that I wouldn't fall in the 6% of people who have problems. Well here I am not even a whole month after receiving it, I got a blue screen. If it does not get resolved I am about to be one pissed individual that will get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kumakama

customer_reviews.title: BLUE SCREENS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS COMPUTER I REPEAT DO NOT BUY THIS COMPUTER Ive had it for not even a week and have had several BSOD'S Skytechs customer service sucks they cant answer there phones although I was able to reach them by email at this point i feel like ive wasted $800 and want to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Runs Smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a month ago, and I haven't had any problems with it. Aesthetically, it's very pleasing. It has a square button on the back that, when pushed, changes the color of the rgb ring that you can see through the clear plastic door on the tower's left side. I've never owned a computer of this caliber before, so I have no reference point. However, from what I can tell, this is an excellent computer.
customer_reviews.author: brgnhunter

customer_reviews.title: Very good computer for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: My son and I were very skeptical of gaming computers after several very bad experiences. He picked out this computer, and after reading the reviews, we decided to give Skytech Gaming a shot. Wow, are we glad we did!!! The pc was packaged very securely with very specific set up instructions. Not only is it an attractive pc, but, more importantly, it performs probably a little better than what we were expecting. We haven’t had the need for tech support, but based on other reviews, tech support is fast, friendly, and knows what they are doing. I would definitely recommend this gaming pc
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Runs OK when it's not in a crash loop
customer_reviews.text: After a little over 6 months, this thing started randomly crashing and restarting over and over. I tried to get support from the manufacturer but that was nearly impossible. I resorted to having it professionally handled and paid for the service. After a few hundred spent on repairs that should have been free, it now enters crash loops and restarts repeatedly with the same ease as before! I wound up buying a Corsair PC that has never disappointed. Spend the extra money on something better, this is not the PC you're looking for. I gave it two stars just because it was so amazing for the first few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Way too many issues. I will be just surfing the web (no crazy amount of stress on PC) and get a blue screen with a memory related error. I’ve only downloaded 2 games on this PC, both very trustworthy and reliable. Can’t play either game for more longer periods of time without PC crashing and giving me a blue error screen. Gotten two different (memory-related) error codes, followed by the automatic reboot. How can there be so many problems to come with a "brand new" PC? Lol such a waste of money, very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great system at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the price. I was looking at building a new system but when I priced the same parts out this was a much better route. Computer will handle anything you throw at it. The build design is very clean and efficient. Systems runs smooth and very quiet. I am thrilled with the new system and will not hesitate in buying from Skytech again.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: This computer is fantastic for the price and customer service is on par
customer_reviews.text: This computer is fantastic for the price and customer service is on par. I want to give a heads up though. When you get it,make sure you update any drivers or else your games may crash. My computer crashed a couple of times due to expired drivers. After I updated them, it was smooth sailing from there. Great PC and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelko

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Computer kept blue screening randomly. Reinstalled windows, now it freezes and blue screens. Graphics card may be faulty. Will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 Year later review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this PC 2 years ago, wanted to transfer over from console to PC on fortnite.. So far it has gave me NO problems. Runs smooth and games like Fortnite run at around 200 fps. You wont go wrong with this PC.
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: An excellent deal.
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this machine was about as good as I could get for the price. And I think I was right. I don't especially care for the white plastic case. But it is what's inside that counts. The thing is fast, fast. Blows away my five year old comp. I truly believe that it will handle any game out there, what with the top-of-the line 1080 in it. I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Russell

customer_reviews.title: this review is really for parents like me--who are novices to this sort of thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pc for my son. I originally bought a gaming pc from another competitor/ seller and it would not play rainbow 6 siege (which I know nothing about) but that pc did not have the speed to play the game and I had to return it. The sky tech pc plays the game without any problems--and I would hear about it if it did not. there is a lot to learn if you are buying a pc to play video games--rather than other pc work. this review is really for parents like me--who are novices to this sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: 1989nyc

customer_reviews.title: My son would recommend this gaming PC to anyone who would listen!
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is 13, absolutely loves this gaming PC. To be honest, I don’t know much about gaming systems but he did his homework and wanted this one. I haven’t heard a single complaint from him since receiving it a few months ago. If you’d ask him, he’d highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use. Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: I have played console games my entire life. I have friends that wanted to play WOW with me and kept urging me to get a computer. This is my first gaming PC and I absolutely love it. It's been 3 months and I play all kinds of games i never expected. Plus I can easily capture and edit Epic moments in the games. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A deserving young man loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a 13 year old boys Christmas gift, he lost his dad a few years back and loves to play the games he used to play with him. He loves technology and loves this PC Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  A Dixon

customer_reviews.title: stays cool and runs very quietly
customer_reviews.text: For a reasonably affordable gaming pc it handles very well. So far I’ve had no problems with the pc I can run all of my games outside of star citizen in ultra with the GeForce 1060 graphics card. It boots up very quickly, stays cool and runs very quietly. The case is easy to get inside of for me to add an SSD the only con is there is no CD drive pre installed but with most drivers having a digital download you won’t really need one also external drive can be purchased to use if you really need it.
customer_reviews.author: daniel chittenden

customer_reviews.title: especially at night (The red inside lights up my room nicely and makes sure I never trip over my setup ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer is absolutely gorgeous, especially at night (The red inside lights up my room nicely and makes sure I never trip over my setup by accident :) Be advised however that this does NOT come with a keyboard and mouse as advertised. There is no Optical Drive either. The system is very responsive however and very polished looking, I ran Rainbow Six on High Settings with no problem :) Can't wait to get more money to put more on this beast. The boot up is also very impressive for lacking an SSD :)
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Sanders

customer_reviews.title: System compatible with virtual reality gaming systems
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer for my son to use with his Oculus virtual reality system. It works beautifully and it comes with everything you need to start except for the HDMI cable. At first we couldn’t make the computer boot, but we contacted technical support and they knew exactly what to do to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable, fast, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I will say thus is amazing and massive, lots of room for updates and add ons. Downside was the instructions that say take the plastic cover off the side to get the packing out was inside the unit as well, so recommend paying attention to that
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Read the blue-screen stories in the reviews...
customer_reviews.text: The blue screen issues folks are having are real, and they're annoying AF. Two windows updates and two complete system resets so far. Their technical support hours are awful, and basically non-existent if you have a day job. I will likely return this to Amazon if I get one more blue screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: I have had the skytech st-arch-II-002 Archangel for a month now and I had just a few issues with things like the keyboard even though now I have already replaced it. I love the computer and it meets my needs just fine it plays games like fornite and the sims 4 (with all expansion packs,game packs,stuff packs and a bunch of cc and mods)with good frame rates.
customer_reviews.author: lizzies25

customer_reviews.title: Bit annoyed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this about a year ago. Awesome computer runs great for games.. Issue is is that I get windows errors ALL the time. Bad configuration seems to be most of my problems. Im stuck in a endless loop of blue screen right now so im not really happy with it. But when it wants to work it runs fast.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a high school graduation gift and he said it's awesome. I don't game so I can't put my 2 cents worth in but I have not heard one complaint from him about this gaming PC. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Schaf

customer_reviews.title: Great PC!!!
customer_reviews.text: This PC met all my expectations and then some! Product as described, perfect for gaming, plenty of memory and was shipped super fast! I can't state enough how great this tower is, it really meets my gaming needs.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Packaging is top notch. Runs quiet and fast. Although the included wifi adapter is not that fast, it does a good job until you can purchase a wifi card. The top ports come with covers which is awesome cause...dust. Gaming wise, I can play Ark: Survival Evolved, 7 days to die, and Empyrion: Galactic Survival with no stutters, freezing. Very happy with my purchase. It does not come with a dvd drive although that is not why i gave it 4 stars. (If you give them 5 stars their is no room to improve :) ).
customer_reviews.author: ZombieSlayer83

customer_reviews.title: best buy by far!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research looking for the right PC for me and this one is definitely the one for me. It has a great look and has great specs. I got this for games and work. It can play all the games that I have played at the highest setting, I can get around 100 fps on fortnite but that is at max settings, if you go lower it can easily get to 144 fps. It is also very easy to set up and took me 15 minutes to do. All around great buy, recommend to anyone who wants a great PC for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alicarwil

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: Overall, poorly built computer. NO CD Rom, which I admit I misread the description and very slow. Very loud operationally and not able to handle even the simplest of tasks in video editing software. Glitchy, and reached out to the vendor with zero reply so I returned it. Will never buy another one of their products.
customer_reviews.author: David K Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully and looks just as good
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully and looks just as good. Make sure you read the instructions on the side and take out the padding before you turn it on. It’s packed very very well. Some people didn’t like the keyboard and mouse, but they’re not bad. I use the mouse and love the lights. It’s run every game I’ve played better than my PS4 ever did. I’ve had it a week now and no problems yet. They do offer a phone number for support if needed. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lance Davis

customer_reviews.title: smooth performance and cool to the touch
customer_reviews.text: I am very very content with this product, everything works as intended, smooth performance and cool to the touch. Only thing that makes me give this a 4 rather than a 5 is the tempered glass was damaged through shipping, there was not much cushioning inside the box. The computer is perfectly ready to go without any building required and incredibly easy to set up from the box
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Had this PC for 9 months and still great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great PC at a great price and didn't have to go through the hassle of building my own. Plays every game with no issues or lag. I have it hooked up to a VIVE VR headset and no issues. Looks great and runs great. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dean N

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and is almost silent
customer_reviews.text: Had the computer for over a month now and no problems. Works like a charm and is almost silent. Onloy downside is the wifi adapter it comes with is pretty low so i would recommend upgrading and getting a better one if you can. Overall, its a solid desktop for high end gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Placido Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and quiet machine. No issues with it. Video and audio quality excellent. I would recommend this system for the beginner or middle level gamer. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Affordable gaming computer with no bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming computer at a reasonable price. Well packaged. Easy to set up. Had it running in just a few minutes. This is my second Skytech computer and they do not disappoint. I love playing my favorite games with no lag. No bloatware is one of my favorite features. It's why I bought a second Skytech computer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hemmings

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: Started up runs and downloads fast. Down side it sounds like I'm flying a drone as soon as I start playing a game. I keep waiting for a fan blade to go flying out of it.
customer_reviews.author: mark biran

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: To be honest whith you i have a trouble with this product when i bought it, but the technical support was amazing and incredible since the begining of this situation they always dispossed to fix every single issue and now this is just amazing, the performance and every single detail of this product. And now my set up is complete. Thank you for everything skytech.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Alejandro Rua Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box plug n play great system, good value
customer_reviews.text: New to buying a system rather than making one. My wife system was crashing after 15 years in service and she need a good system to do her home office work and weekend gaming. This was easy for her to pull out of the box and get the system running within minutes. Great system for the money works for all her graphic, gaming and office project needs
customer_reviews.author: D. Lusher

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: It is a great machine for gaming! I have not had any issues whatsoever. I would buy an SSD though, and even though a 1060 is great, it only has 3GB of VRAM, not a whole lot if you plan on playing AAA titles on high. For my use though, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for photography. I use Lightroom and Photoshop and it is lightning fast. Very happy with my decision and will look at Skytech the next time I need to make an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Yertman

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: So I’ll start off with it being a great pc. However I did have an issue with my ram stick being faulty and contacted the customer support , right away they worked with me to figure out what my problem was initially. It took only hours to figure that out. Then the next day they sent me new parts. I would highly recommend this pc it runs amazing and their customer support is awesome. Very nice people and easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Jaws

customer_reviews.title: A great computer.
customer_reviews.text: The computer is great. It's able to run all the games I want it to at excellent frame rates. The only problem I encountered with this computer was the cord for the keyboard was cut open a little bit exposing the wires, but that was an easy fix with some electrical tape. I am quite pleased with this purchase, and would recommend anyone looking for a good computer to get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Snake243

customer_reviews.title: If you want a low/mid end PC this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the PC for a little over a week so this review isn't going to be much help but I will say that it was delivered faster than it was originally suppose to and it runs incredibly smooth, every game I was hoping it would run has ran incredibly well and I'm very pleased with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping...great build for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping...great build for a great price. I priced the parts out myself and would have spent more building it myself 👍👍 **Only thing I recommend is getting your own WiFi card or usb. The one that comes with it is older and super slow.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing desktop! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This desktop is amazing. It is beautiful and completely silent. The desktop has many different USB ports and works beautifully. It was very easy to set up and is exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Ststem For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system just after valentine's day, and am loving it. It needed extra packing materials removed to boot, but no tools were required to do this. The graphics are amazing. Running HD installs on supreme graphics I'm getting 85 to 135 fps.. that's world of tanks and world of warships.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't cry when you see it use it first
customer_reviews.text: First impression opening the box was what a POS then I pulled out the key board and it looked like paper with keys. But mouse is the only thing worth anything. But the total performance is pretty good I would compair to a 2014 Alienware laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a desktop upgrade from my seven year old laptop and this was the best choice ever. It's sleek and roomy, so I have plenty of room to upgrade as needed. It came quickly and I have been using it with absolutely no issues. Will purchase from Skytech again!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE!

customer_reviews.title: Great pc!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I was surprised to find a pretty nice mouse and keyboard came with it! I’ve had this computer now for 5 months and I must say it’s been amazing! There’s nothing it can’t run on the highest settings and even the WiFi adapter it came with has been up to par for gaming and streaming video. All in all this was a great buy and would gladly buy form this company again!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, I'm using this machine for Deep Learning and it works great. I installed Ubuntu without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Christian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer! Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the gaming I do, perfect for me. I have not had any issues or a need to contact Tech Support for any reason, however, I have received emails from the company checking on the computer and asking if they can be of any assistance. It was very easy to set up and get going. I will be purchasing another one of these in the near future for another family member.
customer_reviews.author: Yolinda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect starter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a starter gaming pc and it’s been great. If you need to use wireless internet, you will want to invest in a better adapter, but other than that, it’s wonderful. Plug and play with great specs for a starter.
customer_reviews.author: rebelkel

customer_reviews.title: Great PC out of the Box!!
customer_reviews.text: Runs great out of the box...just turned it on and set it up, so will see how it goes. I had never heard of Skytech, but read many great customer reviews about this up and coming pc maker, and I checked out their website. Their prices can't be beat, and the process ordering on Amazon has been great, start to finish. The pc came very professionally packaged with all the gear and manuals...even expanding foam in case for protection. I really like Skytech so far, and I am very picky when it comes to pcs. I am in line for a high end pc, and I will consider Skytech first over anybody else at this juncture. Check them out!!
customer_reviews.author: wxman_slaw

customer_reviews.title: I am really satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Waited a little to thoroughly test the computer. I am really satisfied with the purchase, I did a lot of research between making and building one. For a budget price, and looking to play basically any game out right now. This is the pick! Also very durable. I keep it in my garage. Has held up to dust!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PC
customer_reviews.text: Great PC for what I was looking for. Great value for what you're getting as well, and a beautiful looking setup (I got the white with blue lights version). Plays Overwatch maxed out. The Witcher 3 maxed out. Etc. Came fully set up, just had to take out the packing materials inside the case. As it says in the instructions, you have to make sure to connect the monitor via a specific port (near the bottom of the back of the case).
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: 4.5!!!!Great for the money spent!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall build the only thing I didn't notice before purchase and dislike is that the section I am able to put the Elgato HD60 Pro in has one of the pop-out metal pieces instead of the adjustable and moveable ones so if I ever upgrade anything I will need a new back panel or a new case if they don't align to the same PCIE slots. outside that minor inconvenience it is an absolutely amazing build for the money you spend. I have been streaming with my legato HD60 Pro using my Razer Kiyo and a green screen and playing computer games all with no FPS or slowing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Twitch JMcQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a gaming pc for the first time. This one really performed well. Smooth and quiet operation. Well done, will buy again in future.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great PC!, but has a little starting out kinks...
customer_reviews.text: I love this PC, and it runs many newer titles like Fallout 76, Subnautica, and Overwatch on high/ultra with barely any frame drops or crashes. I did have some trouble with DPC Watchdog violation blue screen errors, but they have ceased to be much of a problem. My biggest word of advice is making sure all of the software is updated and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: MintyAF

customer_reviews.title: make sure you have the proper cables for connection to monitor
customer_reviews.text: overall having to wait for connecter, working very well at this time. was pleased with looks, and not hard to connect. would recommend this product again. thank you
customer_reviews.author: georgia brownpatricklike

customer_reviews.title: An absolute STEAL.
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money, its specs are better than anything else at the price ($850) and its even better or equal to some more expensive ones ($1k-$1.5k). If you want to get the best bang for your buck, this is the way to go. Plus I think it looks cool, some prebuilts out there look clunky or super extra, this one is sleek and cool. Satisfied with my purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L

customer_reviews.title: Beast Gaming PC!
customer_reviews.text: Was here in 5 days runs great ..All i play is Swtor ..this is my girst PC i can play on the highest settings in pvp and operations..love it..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anthony Belman Jr

customer_reviews.title: For gaming is great
customer_reviews.text: I just got the computer today and as of now its running great, it runs Fortnite in epic graphics without lag. I have no other words to say other than its amazing. If anything goes on in the future I will EDIT the review and let you guys know.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Labori

customer_reviews.title: Wrong graphics card
customer_reviews.text: The computer I ordered said gtx 1060 3gb graphics card and the computer came with gtx 1050 Ti.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great
customer_reviews.text: This computer is AMAZING it doesn’t lag at all and when it does it’s because of internet. The graphic card is also very nice. I bought this for my grandson and he loves it, it’s his first gaming PC but probably not his last, if this is your first PC I would DEFINITELY recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: NannaDx4

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now and love it. Very easy set up. Originally bought it to play DCS world and it runs it great on high settings. Can't beat the performance for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Genna T

customer_reviews.title: Totally in love with this PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer a few weeks ago. I love it! its a very decent mid range gaming PC. I have been running Rainbow Six Siege at a beautiful 150fps and running other games and such frame rates! It is a beautiful and elegant design and totally worth the money. I would highly recommend this for a PC on a budget. Also there is a bit of decent space to upgrade if you wish.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I was looking for . Without building my own.
customer_reviews.author: wendell

customer_reviews.title: Runs everything smooth and future proof!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, just amazing. The tower is HUGE, the parts are easily exchangeable, making it easy to add upgrades making future proof and all at a decent price where computers are getting more and more expensive. It runs PUBG like a dream on ultra settings (which is the #1 game right now currently) and I’ve tried Overwatch and Skyrim, all beautiful. Many USB ports for all your needs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: THIS COMPUTER IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love the performace and easy set up. We were only confused on the directions, and maybe would like to see a video on the computer being un boxed and set up. But other than that this thing is giving me a high end gaming performace with amazing FPS. What are the pre installed programs on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Dechenes

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering buying this computer, I would highly recommend this product. So far I have played fortnite, rainbow six siege and PUBG all at high settings and am well over 60 fps on all games. Computer is super quiet and looks very nice. Was shipped and delivered super fast as well. So far I am loving this PC!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pc crashes a lot
customer_reviews.text: Pc crashes 24/7 and especially fortnite crashes a lot and low FPS while streaming and recording etc
customer_reviews.author: Christian Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The pc was packaged very well, everything worked when I followed the quick start guide. I put the HDMI in the wrong spot but it was a quick fix by reading the guides provided. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mountain man

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quiet and able to run games smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Using for online single player games. runs all without problems. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: pmonnat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Great Specs
customer_reviews.text: Just received the package, it looks absolutely perfect for the price! And the Specs are perfect as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dead computer
customer_reviews.text: Had this computer for a little bit over a month and now it will not power on. Shut it down for the night and tried to power it back on the following day and nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Product exceeded my expectations and I am extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this computer about a week and so far, it has met all my expectations. I have not owned a PC in quite a while, so the fact that this one did not have a cd-rom drive threw me for a loop. However, the components all look great, the Elgato capture card I installed went in easily with no hassle. I have only tried out some of the streaming sites like Twitch and Youtube and they all run at break neck speed and clarity. So far, I would recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: No complaints for this pc. Can play most games on ultra graphics settings. I have been playing destiny 2 on high settings for awhile now and the frame rates only drop from 60 to 50, can play WoW on ultra. Great for streaming and dual display.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far, this PC has performed extremely well. The only issue I had was the fact it showed up without a power cable. I doubt this is common judging by the review history. Luckily, I had an extra to make due. Amazon is refunding part of the purchase price. But still, overall a great value purchase. Runs great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This PC is amazing, it runs rather quickly and allows me to multitask between different programs much better than my previous one! 5 stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: andrewmartinez

customer_reviews.title: Time waster
customer_reviews.text: If you like freeze-ups, lost work, blue screens with various Windows error messages, non-existent support, and messages like "please wait", then this is the PC for you. After updating drivers several times and eventually Windows 10 over several days I gave up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Auffinger

customer_reviews.title: Good/helpful customer service
customer_reviews.text: Design looks amazing. Came rather quickly after ordering, did have a issue with the ram being faulty but they were quick to send replacement ram, has worked perfectly since then, runs just about any game i could want it to with minimum lag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First PC, Best PC.
customer_reviews.text: Runs like butter, graphics are amazing. I highly recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Zyiah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful machine. Fast and amazing graphics great gaming machine
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee78

customer_reviews.title: I loved the computer when I first got it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the computer when I first got it, it is much faster than I expected and it is great for it's price. It's also really easy to set up. I do YouTube and this is a great item for making YouTube videos. I can run all of the games I play such as TitanFall on high settings with high fps.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Masters

customer_reviews.title: Runs well and it one of the best gaming computers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Runs well and it one of the best gaming computers for the price. Graphics are nice and we've had no trouble with crashing or lagging of games so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this PC and it is fantastic. Runs all of my games smooth and I haven't had any problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great pc for price, only 1 problem.
customer_reviews.text: Wifi adapter that comes with pc is hot garbage, same with mouse and keyboard, but the specs on everything else is great. Not a big deal to get mouse, keyboard and wifi adapter for hte price of everything else. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: AllanM

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best ever
customer_reviews.text: Omg can’t say enough about it its awesome would buy again lovvvvvv
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Just do a couple OS updates and your ready to roll. Love the 16GB RAM!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: This computer ofr the money is amazing I got the computer to play fortnite on and It works amazingly goes 120 fps!
customer_reviews.author: ibright53

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything they said it would be! Came very well packaged and works just like I hoped it would. Does come with a keyboard and gaming mouse! Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I Love It.
customer_reviews.text: High Speed Low Drag. The stock keyboard and mouse is really cool to. This pony is my new beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Homerun here
customer_reviews.text: Don't leave 5 stars often but i am here. Was a big purchase for me but has been well worth it. Basically all i had to do was plug and play. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JARRETT

product_meta.title: [Gamer's Choice] SkyTech Shadow II Gaming Computer Desktop PC AMD Ryzen 5 1400,GTX 1060 3GB, 1TB HDD,16 GB DDR4, Windows 10 Home
product_meta.description: Size:Ryzen 1400 | GTX 1060 3G| Color:Black | Red LEDThe perfect combo to price and performance, SkyTech Shadow II combines Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB with AMD newest Ryzen 5 1400 CPU to deliver the best value performance ratio. From our benchmark records, this processor delivers faster performance than some Intel i5 systems. Combine with Ryzen chipset and Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB, this powerful machine is not only meant for gamers, but also suited for designers that are power hungry. SkyTech Gaming team are driven to bring the best quality components to ensure durability and stability. Unlike most prebuilt gaming PC out in the market, we do not use generic Power supplies due to high risk of power failure over time. We also use industry high performance G. Skill gaming memory that comes with lifetime warranty. We guarantee you will be impressed the moment you receive this beautiful PC. Optimized Gaming at 1080p. Newest Ryzen Engine Chipset from AMD Powerful Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3GB Graphics Includes USB Wifi, Keyboard, and Mouse Very Powerful Multi-Threading/Application Stock Capability/Games tested at 1080P Battlefield 1: Ultra Settings 60-80 FPS GTA V: Very High Settings 65-123 FPS The Witcher 3: Ultra Settings with AA x2 60-80 FPS Over watch: Epic Settings with AA x16 98-150 FPS Player Unknown Battleground: 60-85 FPS Specification Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 4-Core 3.2GHz Processor Motherboard: A320 Micro-ATX Motherboard Video Card: GeForce GTX 1060 3G (Brand Varies) Memory: 16GB DDR4 2400 Gaming Memory with Heat Spreader (Not Generic Memory) Power Supply: 500 Watt Smart 80 PLUS Certified PSU HDD: 1TB HDD 7200 RPM Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Home 64-bit .
feature_bullets: ✔ AMD RYZEN 5 1400 4-Core 3.2 GHz (3.4 GHz Turbo) | 1 TB 7200RPM Hard Drive | A320 Micro-ATX Motherboard
✔ 16GB Gaming Memory DDR4 2400 MHz with Heat Spreader (Not Generic Memory) | Windows 10 Home
✔ GTX 1060 3GB GDDR5 Graphics Card | Video Output: Dual-link DVI, DisplayPort (version 1.4), HDMI | 5 x USB 3.0, 3 x USB 2.0
✔ Wi-Fi Ready | No bloatware | Free Keyboard & Mouse | Monitor Not Included | 500 Watt High Performance 80 Plus Certified Power Supplies
